title: The Key
author: The Key
content: In blockchain worlds the power is no longer concentrated in the hands of one person. Decentralization means that each partner can influence the future of the project in various ways. Blockchain capabilities make the potential of decentralized governance transparent and even more secure.Â Why secure?Have you ever heard about smart contracts? This is the guarantee of safety: of your money and your dat. The project working on smart contracts ensures the complete anonymity of users, and the transparency of all calculations is guaranteed by a unique smart contract that automatically and instantly distributes all receipts directly to the participants' wallets.The Key is a decentralized blockchain platform working on smart contracts which allows you to explore all the benefits of modern technologies, earn income on the stock exchange & with the referral program.Join us on web3nom.com !
